message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200.  It's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $200 was already a discount.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it.
